mapper.insert: insert into book(bookNum, bookTitle, bookWriter, bookPublisher,bookGenre,bookPrice ,bookContent, bookFile) values((select nvl(max(bookNum),0)+1 from book),#{bookTitle},#{bookWriter},#{bookPublisher},#{bookGenre},#{bookPrice},#{bookContent},#{bookFile})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, bookNum, bookTitle, bookWriter, bookPublisher, bookGenre,bookPrice,bookContent,bookFile from (select * from book where bookTitle like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by bookNum desc)) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rnum, bookNum, bookTitle, bookWriter, bookPublisher, bookGenre,bookPrice,bookContent,bookFile from (select * from book where bookContent like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by bookNum desc)) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rnum, bookNum, bookTitle, bookWriter, bookPublisher, bookGenre,bookPrice,bookContent,bookFile from (select * from book where bookWriter like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by bookNum desc)) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update book set bookReadCount = bookReadCount+1 where bookNum = #{bookNum}
update book set bookTitle=#{bookTitle},bookWriter=#{bookWriter},bookPublisher=#{bookPublisher},bookGenre=#{bookGenre},bookPrice=#{bookPrice}, bookContent=#{bookContent} where bookNum=#{bookNum}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, bookNum, bookFile, bookTitle, bookReadCount, bookWriter from(select * from book order by bookReadCount desc))where rnum<=#{rnum}
